column1: #Text=" Fisherman 's wife says : " But my husband is n't .
#Text=" Katara says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=" Fisherman 's wife says : " They have n't returned !
#Text=They should have been back by now !
#Text=And this storm is becoming a typhoon !
#Text=" Aang says : " I 'm going to find him !
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm going with you !
#Text=" Fisherman 's wife says : " I 'm staying here .
#Text=" Aang says : " We 'll be back soon .
